name: Grave Guardian
description:
The peaceful resting place of you and numerous other people, has been brought to life by a rascal Necromancer in search for someone he's lost. With the graveyard now in chaos, you must talk down this Necromancer to ensure that peace returns to the many pumpkins, crows, and zombies in the graveyard.

Originally made in Unity in 48 hours as part of the Utah Indie Game Jam 2017.

*Note: Buttons are for XBox Controllers. If playing on keyboard, keys are different. Use K and L instead of A and B.
